sentences: Barbara Penny (1929 â€“ 2007) was a British violinist.
She was the first woman to play in the strings section of the Royal Philharmonic Orchestra.
She attended Malvern Girls' College and received a scholarship to the Royal College of Music.
In April, 2008, a Stradivarius violin owned by Penny since 1965 was auctioned by Christie's for $1.2 million.
"The Penny Stradivari Violin Leads Christie's Musical Instrument Auction" (PDF).
